def_cn: (信息)推测性的，猜测性的
def_en: A piece of information that is speculative is based on guesses rather than knowledge.

def_cn: (表情)带着疑问的，好奇的
def_en: Someone who has a speculative expression seems to be trying to guess something about a person or thing.
Speculative is used to describe activities which involve buying goods or shares, or buildings and properties, in the hope of being able to sell them again at a higher price and make a profit.
